data.title: Special-Blurring: Compare Quantum-Spacetime Foam Models to Gamma-Ray Burst Localizations
data.name: Special-Blurring
data.description: Calculates the effect of quantum-foam blurring, appropriate for the special gamma-ray burst GRB221009A.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Download all files from GitHub, at https://github.com/ericsteinbring, contained there as a gzipped tarfile."

"This is the IDL code labelled blurring_special, which calculates the quantum-foam induced blurring... and compares that to the available gamma-ray burst localization data for the special case of GRB221009A."
"To run it: Download all files from GitHub... Untar in your local directory... Launch IDL... >.compile blurring_special  >blurring_special"
